channel.title: Contributing on CUEH ComSec
channel.description: Recent content in Contributing on CUEH ComSec

item.title: How to Contribute
item.description:
If you are a member of ComSec, we would love you to contribute to our site; and as a reward we will display your name as the article’s author.

The type of articles we would like is anything hacking related; this could be from discussing a topic to a walkthrough to a CTF challenge.

Getting Started

Firstly you will need to fork this repository. This can be done through GitHub by visiting our repository and by clicking fork in the top right corner. NB: you must be logged into GitHub to do this!
